Enums/Defaults.html#/s:6STween8DefaultsO.name: overshoot
Enums/Defaults.html#/s:6STween8DefaultsO.abstract: The default overshoot value used in easing functions.

Enums/Defaults.html#/s:6STween8DefaultsO.name: delay
Enums/Defaults.html#/s:6STween8DefaultsO.abstract: The default amount of seconds before every tween starts.

Enums/Defaults.html#/s:6STween8DefaultsO.name: reversed
Enums/Defaults.html#/s:6STween8DefaultsO.abstract: The default state of every tween being reversed.

Enums/Defaults.html#/s:6STween8DefaultsO.name: autoStartTweens
Enums/Defaults.html#/s:6STween8DefaultsO.abstract: The default state of every tween automatically started upon creation.

Enums/Defaults.html#/s:6STween8DefaultsO.name: autoKillCompletedTweens
Enums/Defaults.html#/s:6STween8DefaultsO.abstract: The default state of every tween automatically killed upon completion.

Enums/Defaults.html#/s:6STween8DefaultsO.name: reset()
Enums/Defaults.html#/s:6STween8DefaultsO.abstract: Resets all defaults to their original values.

Classes/Tweener.html#/s:6STween7TweenerC.name: animate(_:to:duration:completion:)

Classes/Tweener.html#/s:6STween7TweenerC.name: count
Classes/Tweener.html#/s:6STween7TweenerC.abstract: The number of tweens crrently being tracked.

Protocols/TweenableProperty.html#/s:6STw.name: Target
Protocols/TweenableProperty.html#/s:6STw.abstract: The type of which the property can be retrieved from and applied to.

Protocols/TweenableProperty.html#/s:6STw.name: value(from:)
Protocols/TweenableProperty.html#/s:6STw.abstract: Gets the value of the property from an object.

Protocols/TweenableProperty.html#/s:6STw.name: apply(to:)
Protocols/TweenableProperty.html#/s:6STw.abstract: Sets the value of the property on an object.

Protocols/Tweenable.html#/s:6STween9Twee.name: tween(to:duration:completion:)
Protocols/Tweenable.html#/s:6STween9Twee.abstract: Animates a tweenable property from its current value to the desired value.

Protocols/Tweenable.html#/s:6STween9Twee.name: tween(to:duration:completion:)
Protocols/Tweenable.html#/s:6STween9Twee.abstract: Animates an array of tweenable properties from its current values to the desired values.

Protocols/Tweenable.html#/s:6STween9Twee.name: tween(from:duration:completion:)
Protocols/Tweenable.html#/s:6STween9Twee.abstract: Animates a tweenable property from the desired value to its current value.

Protocols/Tweenable.html#/s:6STween9Twee.name: tween(from:duration:completion:)
Protocols/Tweenable.html#/s:6STween9Twee.abstract: Animates an array of tweenable properties from the desired values to its current values.

Enums/TweenState.html#/s:6STween10TweenS.name: new
Enums/TweenState.html#/s:6STween10TweenS.abstract: The state of a tween that is brand new or has just been revived.

Enums/TweenState.html#/s:6STween10TweenS.name: inactive
Enums/TweenState.html#/s:6STween10TweenS.abstract: The state of a tween that has been stopped and is no longer updating.

Enums/TweenState.html#/s:6STween10TweenS.name: active
Enums/TweenState.html#/s:6STween10TweenS.abstract: The state of a tween that has been started and is currently updating.

Enums/TweenState.html#/s:6STween10TweenS.name: delayed
Enums/TweenState.html#/s:6STween10TweenS.abstract: The state of a tween that is about to start but is waiting for its delay to elapse.

Enums/TweenState.html#/s:6STween10TweenS.name: paused
Enums/TweenState.html#/s:6STween10TweenS.abstract: The state of a tween that has been started but is paused.

Enums/TweenState.html#/s:6STween10TweenS.name: completed
Enums/TweenState.html#/s:6STween10TweenS.abstract: The state of a tween that has been completed.

Enums/TweenState.html#/s:6STween10TweenS.name: killed
Enums/TweenState.html#/s:6STween10TweenS.abstract: The state of a tween that has been killed.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP8r.name: reversed
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP8r.abstract: The state of animating to the target property values (false) or from the target

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP5s.name: state
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP5s.abstract: The tween’s current state, i.e., active, paused, etc.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP5d.name: delay
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP5d.abstract: The amount of seconds before the tween starts updating after being started.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP8d.name: duration
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP8d.abstract: The amount of seconds the tween takes to complete.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP7e.name: elapsed
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP7e.abstract: The amount of seconds the tween has been active.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP8C.name: Callback
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP8C.abstract: The method signature of a callback closure. Callbacks are invoked upon completion

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP8o.name: onUpdate
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP8o.abstract: The callback invoked every time the tween is updated.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP7o.name: onStart
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP7o.abstract: The callback invoked when the tween is started.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP6o.name: onStop
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP6o.abstract: The callback invoked when the tween is stopped.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP9o.name: onRestart
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP9o.abstract: The callback invoked when the tween is restarted.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP7o.name: onPause
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP7o.abstract: The callback invoked when the tween is paused.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP8o.name: onResume
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP8o.abstract: The callback invoked when the tween is resumed.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP10.name: onComplete
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP10.abstract: The callback invoked when the tween is completed.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP6o.name: onKill
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP6o.abstract: The callback invoked when the tween is killed.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP8o.name: onRevive
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP8o.abstract: The callback invoked when the tween is revived.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP5s.name: start()
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP5s.abstract: Starts the tween for updates, putting it in an active state from its beginning values.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP4s.name: stop()
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP4s.abstract: Stops the tween from updating, putting it in an inactive state.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP7r.name: restart()
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP7r.abstract: Stops the tween, then immediately starts it over again.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP5p.name: pause()
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP5p.abstract: Pauses the tween, maintaining its current progress.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP6r.name: resume()
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP6r.abstract: Resumes the tween, continuing where it left off before being paused.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP8c.name: complete()
Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP8c.abstract: Completes updates on the tween, jumping to its ending values if not already there.

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP4k.name: kill()

Protocols/Tween.html#/s:6STween5TweenP6r.name: revive()

Protocols/Tween.html.name: Tween
